Package it.polimi.ingsw.ps51.network.server.socket

Class SocketConnection

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.ps51.network.server.socket.SocketConnection
All Implemented Interfaces:
ServerInterface, java.lang.Runnable
public class SocketConnection
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable, ServerInterface
This class represents the ServerInterface with socket created by the server to communicate with the client
Author:
Luca Giacometti

    • checkName

      public boolean checkName​(java.lang.String nickname)
      Access to the MainServer in a synchronized mode to call the checkName method and if it is a good nickname call the addNickname method to add this client
      Returns:
      true if the nickname is a valid one and it is set false if it is not

    • first

      public boolean first()
      Access synchronized to the MainServer to call the iMFirst method to check is this client is the first one to join for game

    • run

      public void run()
      When this class is instantiated, it starts the first phase: it send and waiting the request of nickname and the answer from the user, checks if it is a good one (if it is unique), and if it is, it adds it to the server list of nicknames creating the link between this nickname and this class. If the client is the first one, requests the number of player of the game and then it sets up that number. If the first one to be accepted in the game is disconnected but the game is not already started, the NumberOfPlayer event is send to the next player. After that, it starts the normal phase of the game. In every phase, it sends continually a Ping event to verify if the client is on or not
      Specified by:
      run in interface java.lang.Runnable
